content: I think I did all the requested modification, so #9128 is ready for review again. Thank you!
Bors failed on this one, but I mergedmaster and everything seems ok. Is there something else I should do?

Looks like the error is a transient one:
"The self-hosted runner: nael lost communication with the server. Verify the machine is running and has a healthy network connection. Anything in your workflow that terminates the runner process, starves it for CPU/Memory, or blocks its network access can cause this error."

bors failed again :thinking:
I don't I can the the logs, so I don't know what went wrong...
"Error: The operation was canceled." in the github action log
Ah, I can see that log... but it wasn't me :)
There are two "Build failed" comments from bors at almost the same time, so I suspect something strange happened with bors. I put the PR back on the queue.
